The most obvious benefit of squats is building your leg muscles – calves. These drills also create an anabolic environment, which promotes body-wide muscle building, improving muscle mass.
A deadlift is a strength-training exercise that primarily targets your hamstrings, lower back, quadriceps and glutes.You are picking up "dead weight" from the ground

As you exercise with a leg press, the muscles worked primarily include the quadriceps and hamstrings.They\'re a Killer Warm-Up on Leg Days.They Build Awesome Quad Strength.They Can Help You Break Through Plateaus.
A fly or flye is a strength training exercise in which the hand and arm move through an arc while the elbow is kept at a constant angle.
A lunge can refer to any position of the human body where one leg is positioned forward with knee bent and foot flat on the ground while the other leg is positioned behin.
The bench press is a core fundamental exercise for developing upper body strength.By touching the bar to your chest, you ensure a full range of motion.

The conjugate system sees you utilize the same movement pattern over and over, but frequently varies how you train that pattern. So while you may know that the main lift in a given workout will be a squat, it could be a Front Squat, Zercher Squat, Back Squat, etc

Gymnastics is a sport that includes exercises requiring balance, strength, flexibility, agility, coordination, and endurance. The movements involved in gymnastics contribute to the development of the arms, legs, shoulders, back, chest, and abdominal muscle groups. Alertness, precision, daring, self-confidence, and self-discipline are mental traits that can also be developed through gymnastics

In a nutshell, BODYPUMP is a 30-, 45-, or 55-minute resistance workout that uses a barbell with very light weights and very high reps. … During the workout, you go through five or six specific exercises, in different combinations, and end up completing approximately 800 to 1000 reps in one 55-minute session

Best for chest exercise: The push-up, Best exercise for glutes: The squat, Best exercise for abs: The bicycle manoeuvre,Best exercise for the back: Pull-up, Best exercise for hamstrings: Swiss ball hamstring curl,Best exercise for thighs: The lunge
